document_data.name: Adamantine Palace
document_data.architecture: [[Adamantine]] construction with engravings of precious metals
document_data.mainbody: The '''Adamantine Palace''' was the seat of power for the monarchs who reigned over the [[dwarven]] kingdom of [[Ammarindar (kingdom)|Ammarindar]], located within the royal city of [[Splendarrmornn]].
document_data.Description: The entire palace was constructed from the extremely rare, and nearly indestructible black alloy, [[adamantine]]. It featured spectacularly engravings, crafted from [[gold]] and [[silver]], inlaid with shimmering [[:category:gems|gems]].
document_data.History: Following the collapse of Ammarindar in [[882 DR]], the royal capital of Splendarrmornn was plundered by [[fiend]]ish [[tanarukk]]s in [[1220 DR]]. During the sacking of the city, many of the decorative inlays and gem stones were stripped away from the Adamantine Palace, though some signs of the dwarves' wealth still remained.{{Cite web/The Shadow Path: The Unspoken Hall}}
